console.info('Gigya (islogin): ' + response.profile.firstName)\n            return window.onGigyaAccountInfo(response)\n          }\n\n          // User is not logged in, so force logout\n console.info('Gigya (performedlogin): ' + event.profile.firstName)\n            return window.onGigyaLogin(event)\n          }\n        },\n\n        onLogout: function(event) {\n          if                        if (!window.inview[targetId] &&                targetElement.getBoundingClientRect().top < (height + offset_bottom) &&                targetElement.getBoundingClientRect().top > (0 - offset_top)) {                window.inview[targetId] = true;                callback();                return true;            }            return false;        },        debounce = function(func, wait, immediate) {            var timeout;            return function() {                var context = this,                    args = arguments;                var later = function() {                    timeout = null;                    if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);                };                var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
